languages.text: {n}Вы не можете не заметить, что сенешаль не знает, как к вам подступиться и с чего начать. При виде его колебаний вы невольно криво ухмыляетесь — словно {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}кто-то другой{/d} злорадствует над замешательством старого офицера. Заметив вашу улыбку, Абеляр собирается с силами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы не можете не заметить, что Сенешаль не знает, как к вам поступиться и с чего начать. При виде его колебаний вы невольно криво ухмыляетесь — словно кто-то другой злорадствует над замешательством старого офицера. Заметив вашу улыбку, Абеляр собирается с силами.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You cannot help but notice that the Seneschal does not know how to talk to you or where to begin. His hesitation brings an involuntary smirk to your face — as though {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}someone else entirely{/d} is gloating at the old officer's confusion. Seeing your smile, Abelard pulls himself together.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы не можете не заметить, что сенешаль не знает, как к вам подступиться и с чего начать. При виде его колебаний вы невольно криво ухмыляетесь — словно {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}кто-то другой{/d} злорадствует над замешательством старого офицера. Заметив вашу улыбку, Абеляр собирается с силами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You cannot help but notice that the Seneschal does not know how to talk to you or where to begin. His hesitation brings an involuntary smirk to your face — as though someone else entirely is gloating at the old officer's confusion. Seeing your smile, Abelard pulls himself together.{/n}

{n}You cannot help but notice that the Seneschal does not know how to talk to you or where to begin. His hesitation brings an involuntary smirk to your face — as though someone else entirely is gloating at the old officer's confusion. Seeing your smile, Abelard pulls himself together.{/n}

{n}You cannot help but notice that the Seneschal does not know how to talk to you or where to begin. His hesitation brings an involuntary smirk to your face — as though someone else entirely is gloating at the old officer's confusion. Seeing your smile, Abelard pulls himself together.{/n}

{n}You cannot help but notice that the Seneschal does not know how to talk to you or where to begin. His hesitation brings an involuntary smirk to your face — as though someone else entirely is gloating at the old officer's confusion. Seeing your smile, Abelard pulls himself together.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你不禁注意到，总领不知道该如何与你谈话，也不知道该从何说起。他犹豫不决的样子，让你的脸上不由自主地露出了一丝笑意，就好像是某个{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}截然不同的人{/d}看到了这位年迈军官困惑的样子，情不自禁地幸灾乐祸一样。阿贝拉德看到你的笑容之后，连忙打起了精神。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot help but notice that the Seneschal does not know how to talk to you or where to begin. His hesitation brings an involuntary smirk to your face — as though {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}someone else entirely{/d} is gloating at the old officer's confusion. Seeing your smile, Abelard pulls himself together.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你不禁注意到，总领不知道该如何与你谈话，也不知道该从何说起。他犹豫不决的样子，让你的脸上不由自主地露出了一丝笑意，仿佛是无关人员看到这位年迈军官困惑的样子，情不自禁地幸灾乐祸起来。阿贝拉德看到你的笑容之后，也打起了精神。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは、家令長があなたとどう話せばいいのか、何から話せばいいのかわからないことに気づかずにはいられなかった。彼のためらいが、あなたの顔に思わず笑みを浮かべる。まるで、この老士官の戸惑いを、{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}まったく別の誰か{/d}がほくそ笑んでいるかのように。あなたの笑顔を見て、アベラルドは気を取り直す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot help but notice that the Seneschal does not know how to talk to you or where to begin. His hesitation brings an involuntary smirk to your face — as though {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}someone else entirely{/d} is gloating at the old officer's confusion. Seeing your smile, Abelard pulls himself together.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは、家令長があなたとどう話せばいいのか、何から話せばいいのかわからないことに気づかずにはいられなかった。彼のためらいが、あなたの顔に思わず笑みを浮かべる。まるで、この老士官の戸惑いを、まったく別の誰かがほくそ笑んでいるかのように。あなたの笑顔を見て、アベラードは気を取り直す。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bemerkst, dass der Truchsess nicht weiß, wie er mit dir reden oder wo er anfangen soll. Sein Zögern lässt dich unabsichtlich lächeln – als würde {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}jemand gänzlich anderes{/d} sich über die Verwirrung des alten Offiziers amüsieren. Als Abelard das sieht, reißt er sich zusammen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot help but notice that the Seneschal does not know how to talk to you or where to begin. His hesitation brings an involuntary smirk to your face — as though {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}someone else entirely{/d} is gloating at the old officer's confusion. Seeing your smile, Abelard pulls himself together.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bemerkst, dass der Truchsess nicht weiß, wie er mit dir reden oder wo er anfangen soll. Sein Zögern lässt dich unabsichtlich lächeln – als würde jemand gänzlich anderes sich über die Verwirrung des alten Offiziers amüsieren. Als Abelard das sieht, reißt er sich zusammen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous ne pouvez vous empêcher de constater que le sénéchal ne sait comment vous aborder ni par où commencer. Son hésitation fait naître un sourire involontaire sur votre visage, comme si {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}quelqu'un d'autre{/d} se réjouissait de la confusion du vieil officier. En vous voyant sourire, Abélard se ressaisit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot help but notice that the Seneschal does not know how to talk to you or where to begin. His hesitation brings an involuntary smirk to your face — as though {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}someone else entirely{/d} is gloating at the old officer's confusion. Seeing your smile, Abelard pulls himself together.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous ne pouvez vous empêcher de constater que le sénéchal ne sait comment vous aborder ni par où commencer. Son hésitation fait naître un sourire involontaire sur votre visage, comme si quelqu'un d'autre se réjouissait de la confusion du vieil officier. En vous voyant sourire, Abélard se ressaisit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}No puedes evitar fijarte en que el Senescal no sabe cómo hablarte ni por dónde empezar. Sus dudas te llevan a formar una sonrisa involuntaria, como si {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}otra persona{/d} se regodeara de la confusión del anciano oficial. Al verlo, Abelard recupera la compostura.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot help but notice that the Seneschal does not know how to talk to you or where to begin. His hesitation brings an involuntary smirk to your face — as though {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}someone else entirely{/d} is gloating at the old officer's confusion. Seeing your smile, Abelard pulls himself together.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No puedes evitar fijarte en que el Senescal no sabe cómo hablarte ni por dónde empezar. Sus dudas te llevan a formar una sonrisa involuntaria, como si te regodearas de la confusión del anciano oficial. Al verlo, Abelard recupera la compostura.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Seneşal'in seninle nasıl konuşacağını, konuşmaya nereden başlayacağını bilmediğini fark ediyorsun. Çekincesini gördüğünde yaşlı subayın kafa karışıklığından zevk alan sen değilmişsin de {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}bambaşka biriymiş{/d} gibi, istemsiz bir sırıtma yüzüne yayılıyor. Gülümsemeni gören Abelard, kendine çekidüzen veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot help but notice that the Seneschal does not know how to talk to you or where to begin. His hesitation brings an involuntary smirk to your face — as though {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}someone else entirely{/d} is gloating at the old officer's confusion. Seeing your smile, Abelard pulls himself together.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Seneşal'in seninle nasıl konuşacağını, konuşmaya nereden başlayacağını bilmediğini fark ediyorsun. Çekincesini gördüğünde, yaşlı subayın kafa karışıklığından zevk alan sen değilmişsin gibi istemsiz bir sırıtma yüzüne yayılıyor. Gülümsemeni gören Abelard, kendine çekidüzen veriyor.{/n}
